title: Word into Art at The British Museum
content:
Thought some typophiles might be interested in this. Beautiful stuff.

[http://www.thebritishmuseum.ac.uk/middleeastnow/word-into-art/index.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20070105024822/http:/www.thebritishmuseum.ac.uk/middleeastnow/word-into-art/index.html)
author: nickplant

comments.content:
Another exhibit, with some of the same people involved is touring as well.

[http://apps.carleton.edu/campus/gallery/dafatir/](http://web.archive.org/web/20070105024822/http:/apps.carleton.edu/campus/gallery/dafatir/)

And a plea for help—I’m working on a book project associated with this show, and am waiting on a few more pieces of writing to come in. The budget is not large, and I’m searching for a university press or publishing interest that might be interested in being involved. If anyone has any ideas, please let me know.
